RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Arquiteta Urbanista pela Universidade Estadual de Londrina/2002. Mestre em Energia pela Universidade Federal do ABC/2010 na área de Geopolítica da Energia. Atualmente é doutoranda do Centro de Ciência do Sistema Terrestre (CCST) no Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (INPE). Tem experiência na área de Planejamento Urbano e Regional e Infraestrutura Urbana, e particular interesse na pesquisa sobre Acessibilidade Coletiva aos Bens Comuns.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Master in Energy Planning at ABC's Federal University in São Paulo Metropolitan Region, Brasil (2010); undergraduate in Arquitecture and Urban Planning at State University of Londrina, Paraná State, Brasil (2002). PhD candidate at the Earth System Science Center for the National Institute of Space Research. Architect & Urbanist by the State University of Londrina / 2002. Master in Energy by the Federal University of ABC / 2010 in the Geopolitics of Energy area. It is currently a doctoral student of the Earth System Science Center (CCST) at the National Institute for Space Research (INPE). Her experience is mainly in the area of Urban and Regional Planning and Urban Infrastructure, and have particular interest in research on Collective Accessibility of Common Good.
